newsitem.title: USA: Levi Strauss & Co names Fanoe USA president.
newsitem.headline: Levi Strauss & Co names Fanoe USA president.

text.p: Levi Strauss & Co. Tuesday named Tom Fanoe as president of the Levi's brand for the United States, effective immediately.

In a statement, Levi said Fanoe, 51, will be responsible for all aspects of the Levi's brand business in the U.S. market, including product development, merchandising, marketing, sales and operations. Fanoe will lead this year's launch of the Levi's brand's largest marketing drive ever to build on the success the brand enjoys with consumers nationwide.
Fanoe, who has been with Levi Strauss & Co. for 28 years and previously served as vice president of customer relations, U.S.A., replaces George Porter who announced his early retirement in April.
